quiz.question: ____ ability
quiz.explanation: 能力, 有能力。They have ability to learn quickly. 他们有能力快速学习。

quiz.question: __ able
quiz.explanation: 能够, 能够。She is able to finish the work today. 她今天能完成工作。

quiz.question: about __
quiz.explanation: 关于, 即将。The meeting is about to start. 会议即将开始。

quiz.question: above ___
quiz.explanation: 在...上面, 首先;最重要的是。Above all, we must stay safe. 最重要的是,我们必须保持安全。

quiz.question: __ abroad
quiz.explanation: 在国外, 去国外。They go abroad every summer. 他们每年夏天都去国外。

quiz.question: absent ____
quiz.explanation: 缺席的, 缺席。He was absent from class yesterday. 他昨天没来上课。

quiz.question: ______ accent
quiz.explanation: 口音, 浓重的口音。She has a strong accent when speaking English. 她说英语时有浓重的口音。

quiz.question: accept _____
quiz.explanation: 接受, 接受提议。I decided to accept offer from the company. 我决定接受公司的提议。

quiz.question: _______ accessory
quiz.explanation: 配饰, 时尚配饰。This bag is a perfect fashion accessory. 这个包是完美的时尚配饰。

quiz.question: __ accident
quiz.explanation: 事故, 偶然地。I found this book by accident. 我偶然发现了这本书。
